actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 12:00 p.m. on June 25, 2024.

The House received a message from the Acting Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Acting Clerk received the following message from the Secretary of the Senate on June 20, 2024, at 4:26 p.m.: That the Senate agreed to the House amendments to S. 870. That the Senate passed S. 1987, S. 3960, and H.R. 1240. Appointments: Board of Visitors of the U.S. Coast Guard Academy.
Pursuant to section 703 of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 903), and the order of the House of January 9, 2023, the Speaker appointed Nancy Altman of Bethesda, MD, 6-year term.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Larry Bucshon to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
